{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISER>
        <NAME>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib</NAME>
    </ADVERTISER>
    <BOOKLIST>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Paions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>2.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>24.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Stahlius</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>1.</VALUE>
                    <SUBCURRENCY>30.</SUBCURRENCY>
                    <CURRENCY_NOTE>kr.</CURRENCY_NOTE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>32.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistlichen</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Krancken Geistlichen oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>48.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Hau-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>40.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
    </BOOKLIST>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration.
2. Added <ADVERTISER> tag with <NAME> tag for the advertiser information.
3. Wrapped each <BIBL> entry in a <BOOK> tag to logically separate entries.
4. Added <BOOKLIST> tag to group all book entries.
5. Corrected 'Arnds' to 'Arndt' in the author field.
6. Corrected 'Stahiii' to 'Stahlius' in the author field.
7. Corrected 'Ejusd.' to 'Ejusdem' in the author field.
8. Corrected 'Hau' to 'Hau' (kept the correct Unicode character).
9. Fixed 'Paions' to 'Paions' (kept the correct Unicode character).
10. Corrected 'Nouvelie' to 'Nouvelle' in the title field.
11. Corrected 'Maiers der Geistl.' to 'Maiers der Geistlichen' in the author field.
12. Structured <PRICE> tags with <CURRENCY> and <VALUE> for clarity and consistency.
13. Added <CURRENCY_NOTE> for the mixed currency in the third book entry.
14. Added <SUBCURRENCY> for the sub-value in the third book entry.
15. Fixed formatting and spacing for better readability.
16. Changed  to explicit Unicode representation for consistency.
17. Removed unnecessary spaces and special characters like  and  in the titles.
18. Ensured all tags are properly closed."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISER>
        <NAME>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib</NAME>
    </ADVERTISER>
    <BOOKLIST>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Paions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>2.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>24.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Stahlius</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>1.</VALUE>
                    <SUBCURRENCY>30.</SUBCURRENCY>
                    <CURRENCY_NOTE>kr.</CURRENCY_NOTE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>32.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistlichen</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Krancken Geistlichen oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>48.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
        <BOOK>
            <BIBL>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Hau-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <PRICE>
                    <CURRENCY>kr.</CURRENCY>
                    <VALUE>40.</VALUE>
                </PRICE>
            </BIBL>
        </BOOK>
    </BOOKLIST>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Added <ADVERTISER> tag with <NAME> tag for the advertiser information.
3. Wrapped each <BIBL> entry in a <BOOK> tag to logically separate entries.
4. Added <BOOKLIST> tag to group all book entries.
5. Corrected 'Arnds' to 'Arndt' in the author field.
6. Corrected 'Stahiii' to 'Stahlius' in the author field.
7. Corrected 'Ejusd.' to 'Ejusdem' in the author field.
8. Corrected 'Hau' to 'Hau' (kept the correct Unicode character).
9. Fixed 'Paions' to 'Paions' (kept the correct Unicode character).
10. Corrected 'Nouvelie' to 'Nouvelle' in the title field.
11. Corrected 'Maiers der Geistl.' to 'Maiers der Geistlichen' in the author field.
12. Structured <PRICE> tags with <CURRENCY> and <VALUE> for clarity and consistency.
13. Added <CURRENCY_NOTE> for the mixed currency in the third book entry.
14. Added <SUBCURRENCY> for the sub-value in the third book entry.
15. Fixed formatting and spacing for better readability.
16. Changed  to explicit Unicode representation for consistency.
17. Removed unnecessary spaces and special characters like  and  in the titles.
18. Ensured all tags are properly closed.
